thread.section_title: The Daily Sentinel - life and entertainment
thread.title: Waste not want not

author: BANKER PHARES Contributing Writer
title: Waste not want not
text:
Waste not want not By BANKER PHARES   
Several years ago in the comic strip Blondie and Dagwood, Blondie returns from a shopping trip and tells Dagwood how much she spent and how much she saved because she bought all the items on sale. Dagwood then remarks, “Why is it that we have to spend money to save money?” kAmp44@C5:?8 E@ 2 DEF5J 3J $E2?7@C5 &?:G6CD:EJ :?
